Nightstrike:::

Nightstrike continued shoutting, insulting and fightting, soon he 
felt tired and his arms and legs were getting heavy with the minutes. 
His sight was blurred. At least, he just could said to someone that 
he belived that was Epyon "You..won't cacht me... Scum" 

Nightstrike eyes fought to be opened, he opened and close them... 
until they definitybly he closed them... After a deep sight, 
Nightstrike was sedated... after 20 minutes.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Prowl/Epyon/Hot Rod/Skyburst::
> 
> Skyburst and Hot Rod carry Nightstrike into a room, and strap him 
down
> on the table, with metal cuffs. Force fields erupt from the exits. 
The
> table's medical tools start sending the sedation virus into 
Nighstrike's
> systems.
> 
> "He will be sedated soon," said Prowl. "You may begin within the 
next 10
> minutes, Azure."
> 
> OOC: This will be my last post untill either Christmas night or
> Wednesday. I'll c'ya later!
